Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining adventure where players dig for resources, upgrade equipment, and collaborate or compete in real-time. The game features procedural world generation, persistent saves, and a fully functional shop system with upgrades, explosives, and teleporters. Built with HTML5 Canvas, MQTT networking, and IndexedDB for offline functionality.
